name: Plantstead
description:
You are invited over to a plantling homestead, that your aunt Natalie runs with her wife. They take care of their cute little plantlings on a small island. You were invited over because Natalie had a little accident and now needs your help.

Game is done by Unity3d as my submission for #myfirstgamejam

Assets the game uses;

  • Character sprites drawn by my girlfriend. @sloppydraws
  • And some less pretty sprites drawn by me.
  • Low-Poly furniture by lkmhr
  • Models from kenney.nl
  • RainMaker
  • Farland Skies
  • Music by Mark Sparling @Markymark665

if you like what i do, consider, supporting my patreon <3
